mapper.select: SELECT taskid, title, description, deadline, status, progress, CASE WHEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP > deadline and status <> 3 THEN 1 WHEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '48 hours' > deadline and status <> 3 THEN 2 ELSE 0 END AS message FROM task WHERE deleteFlg = 0; ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task (title, description, deadline, status, progress, created_at,updated_at, deleteFlg) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{deadline}, 1, 0, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,0);
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM task where taskId = #{taskId} and deleteFlg = 0;
mapper.update: UPDATE task SET deleteflg = 1 WHERE taskId = #{taskId};
